channel.title: music on Andreas Gajdosik
channel.description: Recent content in music on Andreas Gajdosik

item.title: Rumours to MIDI
item.description: Rumours to MIDI (2015) is a custom program written in Python. It scans Twitter for selected words and in real time it generates MIDI notes. Thus it can be used to produce strange rhytms or melodies from information all around the world.

item.title: Tweet Coding Performances
item.description: Performances with group Pavel Ondracka which used data from Twitter to change parameters of sound synthesizers. Through prepared system of commands every spectator could change the musical output.
